page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE OF.....
page.content: JUNE 1985 I got up at 7.30am. I had a shower, got dressed and made my bed. I went downstairs to have breakfast with my sister and baby brother. At 8.45am my Grandpa took me and my sister to school in the car. The school bell rang at 9am and my day at school began. We all went into the big hall for assembly. We joined in with a radio programme to sing and listen to a story. My first lesson was Maths. At 10.40am there was break and then a lesson of English before lunch. At 12 midday we all went into the dinner hall and had a hot dinner prepared by the school cooks. After dinner I went out and practised for the district sports day. The next lesson was swimming in the school open air pool then we had another break. Continued on Page 15
